duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and execute business analysis on business features and user stories.
Gather and understand business needs, translating them into effective user stories and requirements.
Assist in estimation, prioritization, and implementation of cost-effective business process and system solutions.
Work with Product Owner/Business in prioritization and implementation of cost-effective business process and system solutions.
On-board and mentor BAs/new BAs into the organization.
Proactively acquire BU domain knowledge and facilitate the growth of domain knowledge throughout the technical teams.
Lead or support knowledge management initiatives.
Develop a strong understanding of the industry and the organizational vision, mission, strategic goals.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
